title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 38 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 38 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O LORD, rebuke me not in thy wrath: neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
lineList.cn: （大卫的记念诗）耶和华阿，求你不要在怒中责备我。不要在烈怒中惩罚我。

lineList.en: For thine arrows stick fast in me, and thy hand presseth me sore.
lineList.cn: 因为你的箭射入我身，你的手压住我。

lineList.en: There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin.
lineList.cn: 因你的脑怒，我的肉无一完全。因我的罪过，我的骨头也不安宁。

lineList.en: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.
lineList.cn: 我的罪孽高过我的头，如同重担叫我担当不起。

lineList.en: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness.
lineList.cn: 因我的愚昧，我的伤发臭流脓。

lineList.en: I am troubled; I am bowed down greatly; I go mourning all the day long.
lineList.cn: 我疼痛，大大拳曲，终日哀痛。

lineList.en: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease: and there is no soundness in my flesh.
lineList.cn: 我满腰是火。我的肉无一完全。

lineList.en: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.
lineList.cn: 我被压伤，身体疲倦。因心里不安，我就唉哼。

lineList.en: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.
lineList.cn: 主阿，我的心愿都在你面前。我的叹息不向你隐瞒。

lineList.en: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.
lineList.cn: 我心跳动，我力衰微，连我眼中的光，也没有了。

lineList.en: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore; and my kinsmen stand afar off.
lineList.cn: 我的良朋密友，因我的灾病，都躲在旁边站着。我的亲戚本家，也远远的站立。

lineList.en: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me: and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.
lineList.cn: 那寻索我命的，设下网罗。那想要害我的，口出恶言，终日思想诡计。

lineList.en: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.
lineList.cn: 但我如聋子不听，像哑吧不开口。

lineList.en: Thus I was as a man that heareth not, and in whose mouth are no reproofs.
lineList.cn: 我如不听见的人，口中没有回话。

lineList.en: For in thee, O LORD, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我仰望你。主我的神阿，你必应允我。

lineList.en: For I said, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice over me: when my foot slippeth, they magnify themselves against me.
lineList.cn: 我曾说，恐怕他们向我夸耀。我失脚的时候，他们向我夸大。

lineList.en: For I am ready to halt, and my sorrow is continually before me.
lineList.cn: 我几乎跌倒，我的痛苦常在我面前。

lineList.en: For I will declare mine iniquity; I will be sorry for my sin.
lineList.cn: 我要承认我的罪孽。我要因我的罪忧愁。

lineList.en: But mine enemies are lively, and they are strong: and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied.
lineList.cn: 但我的仇敌又活泼又强壮。无理恨我的增多了。

lineList.en: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow the thing that good is.
lineList.cn: 以恶报善的与我作对，因我是追求良善。

lineList.en: Forsake me not, O LORD: O my God, be not far from me.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你不要撇弃我。我的神阿，求你不要远离我。

lineList.en: Make haste to help me, O Lord my salvation.
lineList.cn: 拯救我的主阿，求你快快帮助我。
